ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe im not totally clear on the +ACI-NO DROP+ACI- items.. but what if the person to get the Fiery Avenger is not a Paladin, or someone that can not use it...
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe im not totally clear on the +ACI-NO DROP+ACI- items.. but what if the person to get the Fiery Avenger is not a Paladin, or someone that can not use it... Does that mean its useless? OR sense its a paladin item (assuming) would it be a paladin only quest?

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-
